name: Strategist
description: A player who enjoys complex strategic planning, decision-making, and the thrill of outsmarting opponents.

name: Socializer
description: A player who enjoys interaction with other players, often preferring cooperative or team-based games.

name: Achiever
description: A player who enjoys setting and reaching goals, often those set by the game, but also those set by themselves.

name: Explorer
description: A player who enjoys exploring the game world and its mechanics, often preferring games with rich settings and deep mechanics.

name: Adventurer
description: A player who enjoys games that offer a sense of adventure or discovery, often with an emphasis on exploration and storytelling.

name: Solver
description: A player who enjoys games that challenge their problem-solving skills, whether it's solving a puzzle or figuring out a complex game mechanic.

name: Risk-Taker
description: A player who enjoys games that involve a high degree of risk and reward, where outcomes often hinge on a single decision.

name: Cooperator
description: A player who enjoys games that involve working together as a team to achieve a common goal.

name: Narrativist
description: A player who enjoys games with a strong narrative or story element.
